dmca.title: Notice of Copyright Infringement/DMCA Take Down Demand per 17 USC 512 (c)
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Justin S. [mailto:webmaster@proxify.com] 
Sent: Saturday, March 04, 2006 10:58 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Notice of Copyright Infringement/DMCA Take Down Demand per 17 USC
512 (c)

To Whom It May Concern:

I am writing to file a notice of copyright infringement in accordance with
the Digital Millennium Copyright Act.

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on "http://
proxify.com/". Proxify.com is a wholly owned subsidiary of UpsideOut, Inc.
and has been in operation since 2003-04-14.

2. The material that we believe is infringing the copyrighted work listed in
item #1 appears on "http://slickproxy.com/" which is located at IP address
"70.86.148.218". Specifically, the material is, "SlickProxy.com is a free
web-based anonymous proxy service which allows anyone to surf the Web
privately and securely. Just enter a URL (website address) in the form
above, you can use websites but they cannot uniquely identify or track you.
SlickProxy hides your IP address and our encrypted connection prevents
monitoring of your network traffic.". This material is copied entirely
except that all the appearances of our trademark and tradename "Proxify"
have been changed to their name.


3. My contact information:
Name: Justin Schlecter
Company: UpsideOut, Inc. D.B.A Proxify
Address: 1333A N. Ave., STE 315, New Rochelle, NY 10804
Phone: 1-877-PROXIFY
Email: webmaster@proxify.com


4. Contact information for the owner of the allegedly infringing
material:
ServerCube.com
Server Cube (tokyofriends@gmail.com)
+1.3475636346
Fax: +1.2123345169
Prince Street Station
P.O. Box 55
New York, NY 10012

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright
owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized
to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly
infringed.

Signed,
Justin Schlecter, 2006-03-04
Proxify.com Administrator
1-877-PROXIFY
